forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. South southwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfurls beneath a canvas of mostly sunny skies, painting a pleasant backdrop for the activities ahead. The gentle brush of the south-southwest wind, barely stirring at 3 to 8 mph, whispers promises of warmth, reaching a high near an inviting 66. Such conditions cast a serene glow over the city, infusing the air with that crisp touch of coastal charm, though hints of afternoon chill will emerge as temperatures settle around 64. In this soft embrace, the clarity of the day allows the iconic silhouettes of the Golden Gate and the downtown skyline to stand stark against the azure, though occasionally, an elusive marine layer lingers, hinting at its presence near the bay.

As evening approaches, the mostly clear sky will transform into a tranquil canvas, with temperatures sliding to a comforting low of 52. To match the day’s mild quirks, dressing in layers would be wise—a light sweater or windbreaker for the afternoon stroll or a sunset gathering is recommended. As the shadows stretch and the city glows in the twilight, taking a leisurely walk through the nearby parks or enjoying a quiet moment at a café, watching the world glide by, would be a perfect way to indulge in the grace of this gentle spring day.
